comments.body:
What is being tested here? If the type comes back as "foobar" the test doesn't throw an error. The code isn't asserting that `type` is `d` or `-` or `l`. It seems that this PR is many whitespace and linting changes, plus turning `d` and `-` and `l` into `FileInfoType`. 

Did I miss something?

Yes, it is said on npm, type can only be one of these three values

![Screenshot_20201121-093806](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/24560368/99864320-88557200-2bdd-11eb-8019-4483238d685f.png)
